TextLibrary.Text: Travel to Aries Prime to meet with Trident.
Send Sable to meet with Trident
You must be at least Friendly with Trident.
You must be at most Neutral with the Plasmids.
Travel to Aries Sigma to purchase vague coordinates.
Buy Coordinates (3000 Credits)
You have the Coordinates
Travel to Taurus I to purchase Virtual Marbles.
Buy Marbles (1500 Credits)
You purchased the Marbles
Travel to the Eporium of Keck to purchase Jamming Device.
Buy Jamming Device (8000 Credits)
You bought the Jamming Device
Travel to Hydra VIII to purchase an Improbability Drive.
Buy Improbability Drive (20000 Credits)
You have all you need to engage the Joyriders on Pegasus Kappa
You must be at least Neutral with the Keck.
Attack the Plasmid Joyriders at Pegasus Kappa.
Attack the Plasmids
Success -- Return to Aries Prime for your reward
You must be at least Neutral with the Plasmids.
Return to Aries Prime for your reward.
Report
Trident rewards your service
